Digital Rights are going great: Elections edition

May 7, 2024

Violative of Legal Framework': EC Asks X To Take Down Karnataka BJP's Video

Violative of Legal Framework': EC Asks X To Take Down Karnataka BJP's Video

The Bengaluru police on Sunday, 5 May filed a First Information Report (FIR) against BJP president JP Nadda, state chief BY Vijayendra and the party's IT cell head Amit Malviya for "inciting hatred between two communities."

  • Link to The Quint article







Categories: political party,platform,disinformation,eci
May 7, 2024

Cropped Video Viral As Kangana Ranaut Accepting People Will Not Vote For Her

Cropped Video Viral As Kangana Ranaut Accepting People Will Not Vote For Her

BOOM found that Ranaut was responding to a remark made by Himachal Congress president Pratibha Singh in the original video.

  • Link to Boomlive article







Categories: political party,disinformation
May 7, 2024

Old Photo Peddled As President Accompanying PM Modi To File LS Nomination

Old Photo Peddled As President Accompanying PM Modi To File LS Nomination

BOOM found that the photo is from 2022, when Modi and other senior BJP leaders accompanied Murmu to file her candidature for the presidential post.

  • Link to Boomlive article







Categories: political party,disinformation
May 7, 2024

Video of Andhra Pradesh Minister Shared With False Claims Linked to Chhattisgarh

Video of Andhra Pradesh Minister Shared With False Claims Linked to Chhattisgarh

Fact-check: A video of a YSRCP minister from Andhra Pradesh is being shared to falsely claim that it shows a SDM of Chhattisgarh at a mosque. Vidadala Rajini, YSRCP minister from Andhra Pradesh has been misidentified in the video.

  • Link to The Quint article







Categories: political party,disinformation
May 8, 2024

This Video Doesn’t Show Rahul Gandhi Visiting Ayodhya After Filing Nomination

This Video Doesn’t Show Rahul Gandhi Visiting Ayodhya After Filing Nomination

Fact-Check | An unrelated video is being shared to falsely claim that Congress leader Rahul Gandhi visited Ayodhya after filing nomination for 2024 Lok Sabha Elections.

  • Link to The Quint article







Categories: political party,disinformation
May 7, 2024

Fake Letter About 'Financial Support' to Muslim Voters in Karnataka Goes Viral

Fake Letter About 'Financial Support' to Muslim Voters in Karnataka Goes Viral

Fact-Check: A purported letter claiming to give financial support for Muslim voters going for polling in the ongoing elections is being shared on social media platforms. However, the letter is fake.

  • Link to The Quint article
